class.name: Boundaries
class.documentation: This object sets the properties of the political boundaries.

parameter.name: map_administrative_boundaries_countries_list
parameter.values: AGO:Angola/DZA:Algeria/EGY:Egypt/BGD:Bangladesh/NAM:Namibia/BOL:Bolivia/GHA:Ghana/CCK:Australia CCK/PAK:Pakistan/LBY:Libya/MYS:Malaysia/PRK:Korea, North/TZA:Tanzania/BWA:Botswana/PRY:Paraguay/SAU:Saudi Arabia/MRT:Mauritania/CHL:Chile/CHN:China/LAO:Laos/GIB:United Kingdom GIB/GIN:Guinea/FIN:Finland/URY:Uruguay/NPL:Nepal/CXR:Australia CXR/MAR:Morocco/YEM:Yemen/ZAF:South Africa/TGO:Togo/SYR:Syria/KAZ:Kazakhstan/COD:Congo (Kinshasa)/NGA:Nigeria/ZWE:Zimbabwe/GBR:United Kingdom/GUY:Guyana/MMR:Myanmar/CMR:Cameroon/TKM:Turkmenistan/HMD:Australia HMD/TCD:Chad/ROU:Romania/MNG:Mongolia/AFG:Afghanistan/NFK:Australia NFK/BLR:Belarus/ALA:Finland ALA/GRC:Greece/MOZ:Mozambique/TJK:Tajikistan/IND:India/CZE:Czech Republic/ISR:Israel/PER:Peru/IDN:Indonesia/VUT:Vanuatu/SUR:Suriname/COG:Congo (Brazzaville)/ETH:Ethiopia/NER:Niger/COL:Colombia/MDG:Madagascar/SEN:Senegal/TLS:East Timor/FRA:France/RWA:Rwanda/ZMB:Zambia/GMB:Gambia, The/FRO:Denmark/DEU:Germany/AUS:Australia/AUT:Austria/SJM:Norway/VEN:Venezuela/KEN:Kenya/TUR:Turkey/ITA:Italy/RUS:Baikonur Cosmodrome/MEX:Mexico/BRA:Brazil/CIV:Ivory Coast/SRB:Serbia/USA:United States of America/UKR:Ukraine/CAN:Canada/KOR:Korea, South/CAF:Central African Republic/SOM:Somalia/UZB:Uzbekistan/ERI:Eritrea/POL:Poland/GAB:Gabon/ESP:Spain/IRQ:Iraq/MLI:Mali/IRN:Iran/SLB:Solomon Islands/NZL:New Zealand/JPN:Japan/KGZ:Kyrgyzstan/NCL:New Caledonia/ARG:Argentina/SDN:Sudan/PNG:Papua New Guinea/CUB:Cuba
parameter.documentation: List of countries for which to show second level administrative borders. The convention used is the 3 Letters ISO Codes 3166 for countries

parameter.name: map_administrative_boundaries_style
parameter.documentation: Line style of second level administrative boundaries
